---
id: list-action-types
title: "List action event types"

</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/actions/types"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>

</MethodEndpoint>



Lists the supported event types that trigger a pipeline action. Append `?workspaceId` to list event types in a workspace context.
